channel.title: How do I fix the double skill xp stuff?
channel.description:
Ok when you attack the doors, dummies etc i can edit the xp, but it still doubles or triples every time. Heres an example
1st click = 100 xp 2nd click = 200 xp 3rd click = 400 xp 4th click = 800 xP
Or 200 xp gets added everytime you click it etc. Point it i want it so you only get one amount of xp every time. Lets say 100 so
1st click = 100 2nd click = 100 3rd = 100
Please help. Thanks in advance

item.title: How do I fix the double skill xp stuff?
item.dc:creator: @Kracya Kracya
item.description:
@Kracya wrote:

I did that, it only changes the xp, but still doubles or triples etc

Read full topic
item.source: How do I fix the double skill xp stuff?

item.title: How do I fix the double skill xp stuff?
item.dc:creator: @Haiku01 Haiku01
item.description:
@Haiku01 wrote:

check the cases for getting the dummys and for hitting the door and search for the case for the search hayble then you might find something like

addSkillXP and change the amount of xp you want for each case easy as pie :)

Read full topic
